function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of serologic tests for COVID-19","Impact":"Difficulty in identifying and tracking the spread of the virus, leading to potential uncontrolled transmission","Mitigation":"Develop serologic tests to accurately diagnose and monitor COVID-19 cases","Technologies":"Diagnostic testing technologies","People":"General population, healthcare workers, public health authorities","Owner":"Health organizations, research institutions, government agencies"},{"Description":"Lack of specific treatments and vaccines for coronavirus infections","Impact":"Increased severity of illness and higher mortality rates due to lack of effective medical interventions","Mitigation":"Accelerate research and development of specific treatments and vaccines for coronavirus infections","Technologies":"Biopharmaceutical development, vaccine production technologies","People":"Patients with coronavirus infections, healthcare workers, public health authorities","Owner":"Pharmaceutical companies, research institutions, government agencies"},{"Description":"Use of experimental and unapproved drugs for COVID-19 treatment","Impact":"Potential risks of adverse reactions, drug ineffectiveness, and lack of standardized treatment protocols","Mitigation":"Conduct rigorous clinical trials and research to assess the safety and efficacy of experimental drugs for COVID-19 treatment","Technologies":"Clinical trial management systems, drug safety monitoring technologies","People":"COVID-19 patients, healthcare workers, researchers","Owner":"Research institutions, pharmaceutical companies, regulatory agencies"}]}
